item.title: About Investments
item.description: All of these are my personal opinions. If you make investment decisions based on other people’s opinions rather than your own formulated judgement, then it’s a matter of time before the worst case scenario comes! Read the news for facts, not opinions Watch YouTube videos for facts, not opinions, not analysis. Have a clear exit strategy If you believe the company you invested in is the market leader is there a new competitor coming?
